MCommonRules.FreeSpinsFeatureDesc1: 3, 4 or 5 Scatter symbols appearing anywhere on reels award 10, 15 or 20 free spins respectively.
MCommonRules.FreeSpinsFeatureDesc2: During any free spin while the reels are spinning, 3 Wild symbols may be added on reels 2, 3 and 4.
MCommonRules.FreeSpinsFeatureDesc3: After wins are awarded, any Medusa symbol and/or Poseidon symbol appearing on the reels will be added to the Special Meter.
MCommonRules.FreeSpinsFeatureDesc4: Prize is shown above the Special Meter and is awarded when a milestone is achieved in the Special Meter.
MCommonRules.FreeSpinsFeatureDesc5: If 12 Medusa/Poseidon symbols are added to the Special Meter, the first milestone of the Special Meter is achieved and 3 times the total bet is awarded to the player.
MCommonRules.FreeSpinsFeatureDesc6: If 24 Medusa/Poseidon symbols are added to the Special Meter, the second milestone of the Special Meter is achieved and 5 times the total bet is awarded to the player.
MCommonRules.FreeSpinsFeatureDesc7: If 37 Medusa/Poseidon symbols are added to the Special Meter, the third milestone of the Special Meter is achieved and 10 times the total bet is awarded to the player.
MCommonRules.FreeSpinsFeatureDesc8: If 50 Medusa/Poseidon symbols are added to the Special Meter, the fourth milestone of the Special Meter is achieved and  30 times the total bet is awarded to the player.
MCommonRules.MiniReelsFeatureDesc1: During any game, 3 mini reels may appear on top of the main reels and each reel spins to reveal either Medusa character or Poseidon character.
MCommonRules.MiniReelsFeatureDesc2: At the end of the spin, if there are 3 Medusa characters in the mini reels, Medusa will kiss and 3 to 5 randomly selected symbols (excluding Wild symbol, Scatter symbol and Medusa symbol) on main reels will be transformed into Medusa symbols.
MCommonRules.MiniReelsFeatureDesc3: At the end of the spin, if there are 3 Poseidon characters in the mini reels, Poseidon will appear and all symbols in 2 or 3 randomly chosen main reels will be transformed into either Ace, King, Queen or Jack symbols.
MCommonRules.MiniReelsFeatureDesc4: Mini Reels Feature cannot be triggered during Free Spins trigger game and Free Spins.
MCommonRules.WildExplain: Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Scatter symbol.
MCommonRules.WildExplain2: Wild symbol appears on reels 2, 3 or 4 only.

MGameRules.Medusa1Desc1: Medusa 1: the Curse of Athena is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot featuring Wild substitutions, Poseidon Feature, Medusa Feature and Free Spins with Wild additions.

Medusa1Desc2.value: The game is played with 30 bet lines (fixed), bet level of %{minBetMtp} to %{maxBetMtp} and bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
Medusa1Desc2.comment: %{minBetMtp}, %{maxBetMtp}, %{minChip}, %{maxChip} will be replaced with game specific configurations
Medusa1Desc2.example: The game is played with 30 bet lines (fixed), bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of 0.01 to 10.

MGameRules.Medusa1Desc16: Free Spins Feature is played at the same bet size and bet level as the spin that triggered the Free Spins Feature.
MGameRules.MiniReelsFeatureDesc5: Mini Reels Feature wins are added to "Win" meter.
MGameRules.FreeSpinsFeatureDesc9: Free Spins Feature wins are added to "Win" meter.
MGameRules.FreeSpinsFeatureDesc10: Scatter symbol does not appear during Free Spins Feature.
